column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=SG : Yes , exactly ( re London bombings ) .
#Text=I am not sure how noticed that was .
#Text=For the mainstream media , that was when they woke up to the power of collaborative media themselves .
#Text=It was certainly the wakeup call for the BBC , who made a lot of changes to their newsgathering process based on the events of that day .
#Text=I think the most interesting question for Wikinews is what uniquely you can do , that no-one else can .
#Text=And I think your greatest strength may lie in coverage of really large breaking news events — the [ 2004 ] tsunami , the London bombings , Virginia Tech .
#Text=Matt : A lot of attention has been given to improving Wikipedia .
#Text=Do you think more attention is needed for the other projects ?
#Text=If so , which ones do you think need more attention ?
#Text=SG : I think that in a way , that question looks at WMF through the wrong end of the telescope .
#Text=I do n't think the best question is ' do the other projects need more attention ' — I think the best question is ' what do our readers need from us , and how can we best give it to them .
#Text=' I think Wikiquotes , for example , will always be smaller than Wikipedia in terms of readership , and that 's fine .
#Text=Wikinews , I think , needs to chart a path that may be quite different from Wikipedia .
#Text=And Commons is an entirely different beast as well .
#Text=So they are all quite different , with different needs .
#Text=Dodge : What advice can you give to aspiring journalists , based on your experiences at the CBC ?
#Text=SG : Hm .
#Text=I think it 's an incredibly exciting time to be a journalist .
#Text=The best advice I could give people is to find excellent , curious , brilliant journalists to learn from .
#Text=They might be here , or in a conventional newsroom ; it does n't matter .
#Text=Journalism is a craft and the best way to learn it is to surround yourself with really good teachers .
#Text=I was lucky at the CBC
#Text=Brian : " Above all , the central question about the Wikinews effort is its credibility .
